i learnt of opalized wood, a type of petrification, where silica - often deposited by volcanic ash - seeps into the wood, slowly replacing & preserving the structure. the wood becomes an organic gem

text:
RT @rob_rizzo87: If you are curious about how #DeepLearning can perform image segmentation, please stop by Room K1 at 10.55 #EGU23. 

I'm presenting a new method that helped us in segmenting time-series synchrotron tomographies. @johneclogite @mcgillgina_29 @nanoOlli

https://meetingorganizer.copernicus.org/EGU23/EGU23-7120.html https://twitter.com/rob_rizzo87/status/1651462080392822785/photo/1
user_description: Senior Research Fellow. Experimental geochemist. Right arm over the wicket. Lake District and real ale enthusiast. Man of Kent exiled in Scotland.

text:
If you are curious about how #DeepLearning can perform image segmentation, please stop by Room K1 at 10.55 #EGU23. 

I'm presenting a new method that helped us in segmenting time-series synchrotron tomographies. @johneclogite @mcgillgina_29 @nanoOlli

https://meetingorganizer.copernicus.org/EGU23/EGU23-7120.html https://twitter.com/rob_rizzo87/status/1651462080392822785/photo/1
user_description: Structural Geologist with @Dstunifi back in Italy after 7yrs in UK. Co-author of @FracPaQ. I play with #Wavelets, #Statistics, #ImageAnalysis, #MachineLearning
